Indian Economy.title: Building cities that embrace migrants

Indian Economy.title: India’s GST database is a gold mine for just-in-time policy responses
Indian Economy.summary: Signals of shifts in economic trends far ahead of GDP data could prove invaluable for policymakers, businesses and investors. After all, India’s GST collections are seen to move in lockstep with non-agricultural GDP growth.
